LanguageData.DMS_MechLink.label: Cluster Transceiver
LanguageData.DMS_MechLink.description:
A man-made bionic implant that allows for the direct control of mechanoids. No one knows if it is the early model of Mechlink technology or its reverse engineered product by later generations. Anyways it is a proper mechlink in all degrees but one that humans based in technologically-disparate rimworlds can understand and imitate.
Due to processing precision issues, these imitations from rimworlds often have some side effects after installation...
LanguageData.DMS_MechLink_Nerfed.label: Boid Controller
LanguageData.DMS_MechLink_Nerfed.description: A man-made bionic implant that allows for the direct control of mechanoids. This is a simplified version which allows the device to be manufactured and used at a lower tech level. But due to its limited production quality, it will fail and terminate after a certain period of time.
